tool_description: Evaluates safety risks associated with wild plant identification and harvesting, including toxic lookalikes and contamination risks.

identified_species.description: Name of the identified edible species

harvester_experience.description: Harvester skill level: beginner, intermediate, advanced, expert

harvest_environment.description: Harvest location type: wilderness, suburban, urban, agricultural, roadside

error_messages: Invalid confidence level: Must be between 0.0 and 1.0
Invalid experience level: Use one of [beginner, intermediate, advanced, expert]
Species not in safety database: Cannot assess risks for unknown species
Invalid harvest environment: Use one of [wilderness, suburban, urban, agricultural, roadside]
Geographic location not recognized: Provide a valid geographic region
usage: Input the identified species, identification confidence, harvester experience level, and location details. The tool provides comprehensive safety assessment and warnings.

overall_risk_level.description: Overall safety risk: low, moderate, high, extreme

toxic_lookalikes.description: List of toxic species that may be confused with target

safety_recommendations.description: Specific safety recommendations for this harvest

proceed_with_harvest.description: Whether it is safe to proceed with harvest
